DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect prognosis-guided v standard medical therapy : 1 ) duration hospital stay ; 2 ) cost-effectiveness ; 3 ) satisfaction quality life ; 4 ) in-hospital 30-day all-cause mortality ; 5 ) 30-day readmission normotensive patient acute symptomatic pulmonary embolism ( PE ) . Design : Prospective , randomize , control , single blind trial . Normotensive patient acute symptomatic PE randomly assign follow prognosis-guided treatment , receive usual care . Setting : Respiratory , Medicine Emergency Departments 15 Spanish hospital . Analyses : Data primary secondary end point analyze accord intention-to -treat principle . The intention-to-treat analysis include randomly assign patient . For efficacy end point , investigator use Mann-Whitney U test . We also use compete risk regression model accord Fine Gray . For safety end point , comparison make use chi-square test . Separate analysis do key prespecified subgroup patient , accord age hospital size .
